Take a test drive!

In this innovative Test Drive, we have deployed OpenStack in the AWS Cloud using EC2 instances and EBS storage, and NetApp Cloud ONTAP from the AWS MarketPlace. Each of the sections takes you through different values you will gain by using Cloud ONTAP with OpenStack Glance, Manila and Cinder using AWS infrastructure.

Try the free test drive today

Our OpenStack story

NetApp continues to drive value into the OpenStack integration for six successive OpenStack releases. With the latest Juno release, NetApp continues to drive new value and innovation for OpenStack storage infrastructure.
